result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Adjoining States. Signed by EFV on 10/7/22. c: SCSO w/ complaint; ec: Attys. kma

3:23 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Zacarias Hernandez Diaz. Defendant Zacarias Hernandez Diaz not in court. INCLUDES 21CT277, 21TR3716, 22CF288, 22CF464, 22TR1226 and 22TR1227. Atty. Perrin is unaware of DE's whereabouts. State requests warrant and notes DE's absconder status. Court issues WARRANT - body only, adjoining states. State requests default on TR cases. Court defaults TR matters and orders: 21TR3716: Fine $263.50. 22TR1226: Fine $263.50. 22TR1227: Fine $175.30. Adjourned: 3:28 PM. kma

03:04 PM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel  ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Shirlene Renee Perrin   DF:  Zacarias Hernandez Diaz appeared.  Monica M (Interpreter) appeared. INCLUDES:  22CF288 (PH) 21CT277, 21TR3716, 22TR1226, and 22TR1227 (all STC).   Interpreter sworn in. Court calls 22CF288 for PH.  S/T Officer Samuel Welbourn; Hudson PD; direct by Atty Ellenwood.  Record reflects identity of the DE. Cross by Atty Perrin. Atty Ellenwood argues bindover, none by Atty Perrin. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Atty Ellenwood states Information will mirror the complaint, Atty Perrin would like to proceed with ARGN. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG to Cts 1,2,3.  Waives speedy trial. Attys and Interpreter sent to JA to schedule the next matter. Court confirms address of DE. Bond continues in form and amount. Atty Perrin enters NG pleas on 21TR3716, 22TR1226, and 22TR122.  21CT277 to trail with CF matter.   Adjourned:  3:20 pm.

Pretrial Assessment. arc  CONFIDENTIAL
Status conference on May 4, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

- I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required be fitted with a SCRAM alcohol testing unit and further understand I am to submit to random alcohol testing at least 4 times per day. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

01:31 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi, DF: Zacarias Hernandez Diaz appeared from jail.  Includes 22CF228, 22TR1226, and 22TR1227. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. Bond argument. Court orders bond. 22TR1226, and 22TR1227: Enter NG Plea. Reserve on Pre Plea Rights. Court sets STC.  Status conference scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
